text: “We've got your signal recognition looks good.  Looks like things are going well on your end $playerName.  Clear skies.”
"Whatever happens next, just know we won't forget it."

The Shadowyards Security force $personRank meets your gaze levelly for a few moments, before simply nodding curtly in acknowledgement and signaling $hisOrHer crew to their stations.  The comms signal cuts out a moment later.
"Surrender. Or don't. Either way is fine by me."
"Got you on scan, Captain and are monitoring you.  Keep your distance."
